trans-unit.resname: PDP14路1 | Bonescythe Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sliver creatures you control have double strike. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
trans-unit.target: Sliver creatures you control have double strike. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

trans-unit.resname: PDP14路2 | Ogre Battledriver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
trans-unit.target: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
